charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was caught off
guard by a sudden loud sound.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1101_0200_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] made [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way over to investigate and
found Hilda training with Iron Leaves.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_0300_1:
Sorry about that! You must’ve been pretty
startled!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_0400_1:
That sound was Iron Leaves slicing a huge
boulder!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_0500_1:
I met Iron Leaves here on Pasio, so I still
have a lot to learn about it.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_0600_1:
I’ve been trying different ways to draw out
its capabilities.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_0301_0800_1: You just have to battle and see!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_0401_0900_1:
That’s what I thought—battles are the best
way to test ourselves! We sure think alike!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_0402_1100_1:
Great idea! I get super hyped for battles,
especially when my opponent and I inspire
each other to improve!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1200_1:
But there are so many people here on Pasio
I want to battle. It’s hard to choose.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1300_1:
But I definitely wanna battle Cheren and
Bianca!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1400_1: They became Neo Champions before I did!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1500_1:
I bet if I battle them, I’ll draw out even more
of Iron Leaves’ strength!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1700_1:
Don’t you think Iron Leaves looks a bit like
Bianca’s partner Pokémon, Virizion?
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1800_1:
I think they might be related somehow!
Wouldn’t that be amazing?!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_1900_1:
Iron Leaves is supposedly from the future!
So maybe something happens in the years
to come!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2100_1:
I bet the towns, people, and Pokémon of
Unova are different in the future.
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2200_1:
Ooooh, just thinking about it is exciting!
Don’t you agree?!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2300_1:
You know what? I’m gonna train to become
so strong, people in the future will know my
name!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2400_1:
Hehehe! I’m sure you’re excited, too!
Together, the two of us can do anything,
Iron Leaves!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2500_1:
I’ll keep having fun battling MY way—the
way I usually do!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2600_1:
That’s what I should show everyone, as a
Neo Champion!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2700_1:
Now that we’re on the same page...we’ve
got the perfect opponent, right here in front
of us!
charaepi_ch0004_90_toko/2301_1201_2800_1:
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s have ourselves a fierce battle!
